member.name: T:Tizen.Multimedia.MetadataEditor
member.summary: Provides a means to edit the metadata of MP3 and MP4 files. Since 6.0, WAV, FLAC, OGG files are supported as well.
member.privilege:
If you want to access only an internal storage, you should add privilege http://tizen.org/privilege/mediastorage.
Or if you want to access only an external storage, you should add privilege http://tizen.org/privilege/externalstorage.

member.name: P:Tizen.Multimedia.MetadataEditor.Date
member.summary: Gets or sets the date of media.
member.remarks: If the media contains the ID3 tag, this refers to the recorded date. If the media is a mp4 format, this refers to the year, and the value to set will be converted into integer.
